articles.author: Brittany Vincent
articles.title: Report: No iOS 15 Update for Apple iPhone 6, Original iPhone SE - PCMag
articles.description: Those with older iOS devices such as the iPhone 6 series and original iPhone SE could be forced to upgrade if they want to take advantage of iOS 15 when it arrives.
articles.content:
(iPhone 6s)
Those who are content with an older iPhone, or can't afford an upgrade at the moment, could soon be left in the dust, according to Israeli publication The Verifier (via Apple Insider).
